name: Flesheater

skills.name: Freeze the Blood
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff on the target for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Tenderize
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. On each critical hit decreases the target's Turn Meter by 15%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Gruesome Nourishment
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
